definitions.definition: A breed of dog developed in England by the crossing of the bullbaiting dog and the Pug to produce a ladies' companion dog, having a very smooth coat , a flattened face, wrinkly cheeks , powerful front legs , and smaller hind legs .

subdefinitions.definition: The original form of this breed, the British bulldog .

examples: We need a lawyer who will fight for our case, a real bulldog .
His bulldog determination was destined to bring him the opportunity he was seeking.

definitions.definition: A refractory material used as a furnace lining , obtained by calcining the cinder or slag from the puddling furnace of a rolling mill.
Any move in which the wrestler grabs an opponent's head and jumps forward, so that the wrestler lands, often in a sitting position, and drives the opponent's face into the mat.
Any of various species of African freshwater fish in the genus Marcusenius , a type of elephantfish .
The children's game of British Bulldog or Red Rover .

main_definition: A breed of dog developed in England by the crossing of the bullbaiting dog and the Pug to produce a ladies' companion dog, having a very smooth coat , a flattened face, wrinkly cheeks , powerful front legs , and smaller hind legs .
secondary_definitions: A refractory material used as a furnace lining , obtained by calcining the cinder or slag from the puddling furnace of a rolling mill.
( UK , Oxford University slang ) One of the proctors ' officers .

( professional wrestling ) Any move in which the wrestler grabs an opponent's head and jumps forward, so that the wrestler lands, often in a sitting position, and drives the opponent's face into the mat.
Any of various species of African freshwater fish in the genus Marcusenius , a type of elephantfish .
( chiefly UK , sometimes capitalized ) The children's game of British Bulldog or Red Rover .
